text:
Created attachment 6877
wokbook1.xls (original file), workbook2.xls (corrupt file)

creator: pjanouskovec@cscploenzke.de
text:
I tried my code (code is in previous comment) in version poi-src-2.0-pre1-
20030517, but I have same problem. For additional, HSSF wrote messages on error 
output:
[WARNING] Unknown Ptg 12 (18) at cell (2,4)
[WARNING] Unknown Ptg 12 (18) at cell (3,4)
[WARNING] Unknown Ptg 12 (18) at cell (4,4)
[WARNING] Unknown Ptg 12 (18) at cell (5,4)
[WARNING] Unknown Ptg 12 (18) at cell (2,4)
[WARNING] Unknown Ptg 12 (18) at cell (3,4)
[WARNING] Unknown Ptg 12 (18) at cell (4,4)
[WARNING] Unknown Ptg 12 (18) at cell (5,4)

We need to fix this but supporting some of the various intenational number
formats is potentially a lot of work.  We need more support from folks with
localized versions of Excel.  This is a good start.  I don't think we can do
this by 2.0 though.
creator: poi-support@buni.org
avik@apache.org
text:
Tested with 2.0RC1 and Excel2002. File opens perfectly in Excel, charts,
accented text etc all correct.
